Usage: ./autoprat [flags] [PR-NUMBER|PR-URL ...]

List and filter open GitHub pull requests.

Filter PRs and generate gh(1) commands to apply /lgtm, /approve,
/ok-to-test, and custom comments.

By default, lists all open PRs when --repo is specified alone.
Optionally focus on specific PRs by providing:
  - PR numbers (e.g. "123", requires --repo)
  - GitHub URLs (e.g. "https://github.com/owner/repo/pull/123")

When using GitHub URLs, the repository is extracted from the URL
automatically and --repo is not required.

Repository:
  -r, --repo string       GitHub repo (owner/repo)

Filters:
  -a, --author string     Filter by exact author name
  --failing-check string  Filter by specific failing CI check name
  --failing-ci            PRs with failing CI checks
  -l, --label strings     Filter by labels (prefix with - to negate)
  --needs-approve         PRs missing approval
  --needs-lgtm            PRs missing LGTM
  --needs-ok-to-test      PRs needing testing permission

Actions:
  --approve               Generate /approve commands for PRs without 'approved' label
  -c, --comment strings   Generate comment commands
  --lgtm                  Generate /lgtm commands for PRs without 'lgtm' label
  --ok-to-test            Generate /ok-to-test commands for PRs with needs-ok-to-test label
  --throttle duration     Throttle identical comments to limit posting frequency

Output:
  -v, --verbose           Print PR status only
  -V, --verbose-verbose   Print PR status with error logs from failing checks
  -q, --quiet             Print PR numbers only

Utility:
  --debug                 Enable debug logging
  --version               Show version information


Examples:
  # List all open PRs in a repository.
  ./autoprat -r owner/repo

  # Filter PRs that need approval.
  ./autoprat -r owner/repo --needs-approve

  # Generate approval commands for Dependabot PRs.
  ./autoprat -r owner/repo --author dependabot --approve

  # Execute the generated commands.
  ./autoprat -r owner/repo --author dependabot --approve | sh

  # Focus on specific PRs.
  ./autoprat -r owner/repo --verbose 123 456
  ./autoprat --verbose https://github.com/owner/repo/pull/123
